nnamI#vAH || 
EqSha sya vAqjI kShi#paqNiM tu#raNyati grIqvAyA$M baqddhO a#pikaqkSha Aqsani# | 
kratu#M dadhiqkrA anu# saqtaMvI$tvat paqthAma~gkAq(gg)q syanvAqpanI#PaNat || 
uqta smA$syaq drava#tasturaNyaqtaH paqrNaM na vEranu# vAti pragaqrddhina#H | 
SyEqnasyE#vaq dhraja#tO a~gkaqsaM pari# dadhiqkrAv.NNa#H saqhOrjA tari#trataH ||
A mAq vAja#sya prasaqvO ja#gamyAqdA dyAvA#pRuthiqvI viqSvaSa#BUM | 
A mA# gantAM piqtarA# - [  ] 36
